c:attribute.name: devices
c:attribute.description: The addresses of all the security devices that participate in this mode.

c:attribute.name: entranceDelaySec
c:attribute.description:
The amount of time an alarm device must be triggering for before the alarm is fired.
Default: 30

c:attribute.name: exitDelaySec
c:attribute.description:
The amount of time before the alarm is fully armed.
Default: 30

c:attribute.name: alarmSensitivityDeviceCount
c:attribute.description:
The number of alarm devices which must trigger before the alarm is fired.
Default: 1

c:attribute.name: silent
c:attribute.description: When true only notifications will be sent, alert devices will not be triggered.

c:attribute.name: soundsEnabled
c:attribute.description:
Hub and keypad make sounds when arming.
Default: true

c:attribute.name: motionSensorCount
c:attribute.description: The number of the number of motion sensors associated with this mode
